Everything You Need to Maintain A Perfect eCommerce Ecosystem.

6Valley has all the essential eCommerce panels and apps for every user to run the entire eCommerce business with ease.

Admin Panel

Promote, control, and manage total business centrally with real-time reporting system & POS order.

Vendor Panel

Vendors can maintain their online shop, promote, contact customers, and process billing via built-in POS.

Vendor App

A mobile-friendly app dedicated to vendors so they can manage & maintain their online shop through phone.

User App

Users can search, filter, purchase favourite products, and track orders from the 6Valley customer app.

User Website

Easy-to-use & responsive website for users for maximum conversion to ensure a smooth checkout journey.

Deliveryman App

An easy-to-navigate dedicated mobile app for deliverymen to ensure successful & on-time product delivery.

Aster Theme

Experience the user website powered by the Aster theme, included with every core package by default.

Personalized eCommerce Themes According to Your Customer-Base

Elevate user experience with precisely designed & developed 6Valley eCommerce themes that match your brand impression.

Default Theme

A fit-for-all business theme is pre-integrated with the 6Valley user website that comes with the core package.

Aster Theme

An electrifying visual concept that comes with an engaging buying journey- introducing the 6Valley Aster Theme.

Built With Modern Technology For Cross-Platform Performance

We ensure flawless performance using modern technology such as Laravel & Flutter. So every user can use the app across all devices and famous platforms such as Android & iOS.

Technology

Platform

Top Payment & SMS Gateways for Quicker Transaction & Communication

Integrate all the top-rated payment and SMS gateways with 6Valley eCommerce CMS to ensure fast and secure transactions and communication.

Payment Methods & Gateways

We’ve introduced all the convenient payment options so customers can experience a smooth buying journey.

  • Cash on Delivery
  • Offline Payment
  • Customer Wallet
  • Digital Payment

Various SMS Gateways

Notify your customers with the necessary information with a quick and reliable SMS gateway integration feature. This will help you reach your customers instantly, keep them informed, and increase customer engagement.

Best Features of 6Valley eCommerce CMS

We've implemented these special features to enable hassle-free eCommerce business operations.

Single or Multi Vendor Business

Change the business model from single to multi vendor & vice-versa anytime. 

Local & International Platform

Scale your local business to the international corridor by setting area ZIP codes. 

In-House & Vendor Products

Set a platform to sell both in-house and vendor products from a single place.

3rd Party API Integration

Integrate third-party payment & SMS gateways through API to simplify operation. 

Digital & Physical Products

Sell both digital & physical products and cover a more comprehensive customer range. 

Built-in Free POS

Manage orders manually via the built-in FREE POS feature for admin and vendors.

Third-Party Shipping

Apart from in-house and vendor, allow third-party delivery systems to manage shipping. 

Versatile Promotion

Boost your sales with coupons, discounts, deals, and other promotional activities. 

Wallets & Loyalty Points

Enable customer wallets and offer loyalty points upon completion of a targeted purchase.

Delivery Restriction

Enable delivery restrictions and define delivery areas by adding zip codes to the system. 

Order Delivery Verification

Ensure perfect delivery by verifying customers' delivery location & phone number. 

Default Commission

Set default commission rates for vendors and generate profit upon every sale from vendors. 

Add Fund to Wallet

Enable add funds to wallet so customers can credit their balance for smoother purchase. 

Report & Analysis

Get insights and prepare future forecasts of your business via real-time reports.

Announcement & Push Notification

Send promotional messages and important announcements to all your customers.
    See More

    How does the Admin Earn by using 6Valley eCommerce CMS?

    As an owner, you can experience the most privileges and enjoy multiple revenue streams at the same time!

    Vendor-wise Commission

    Set default commission rates on every vendor or custom commission for each vendor individually.

    Order or Category-wise Shipping

    In terms of in-house shipping, you can earn from two types of shipping charges- order-wise and category-wise shipping.

    In-house Product Selling

    You can set up your own in-house shop and sell products alongside your vendors. It's an independent earning method.

    Any Business, Anywhere!

    With 6Valley, you can start any online business from anywhere in your local area and take your business
    to the international corridor anytime. It’s very easy!

    Frequently Asked Questions

    1. What is eCommerce CMS?

    An eCommerce CMS is a solution that helps its users (vendors & admin) to add, edit, delete, and publish product-based content without coding. 

    2. What is The Difference Between CMS and eCommerce?

    CMS is a content management system that helps users to generate content for any kind of website. An eCommerce is a dedicated website for buying & selling products online. 

    3. What is 6Valley?

    6Valley is a complete multi-vendor eCommerce CMS. With 6Valley, you can create, manage, and sustain your eCommerce business by selling digital & physical products.

    4. Which is the best eCommerce CMS for small businesses?

    Of course 6Valley, because this solution has both single vendor & multi vendor business models. If you want to start small, you can enable the single-vendor business model and sell in-house products. Later, if you want to expand your business, just change the business mode from single to multi-vendor and start adding sellers to your business. Yes, it’s that easy!  

    More FAQs
